title: cannot install the SkiaSharp.Harfbuzz library in nuget
body: my project was a WPF project used .net framework 4.5,when i install SkiaSharp.Harfbuzz, it doesn't work,but when i changed the framework version to .net framework 4.7.1,we did it.so i confuse that can you add something framework dependency information in the description?
